opened mongoDB? (update recipe) opened mongoDB (delete recipe) delete: AcknowledgedDeleteResult{deletedCount=0} opened mongoDB (delete recipe) delete: AcknowledgedDeleteResult{deletedCount=0} loading loading loading loading Fried Rice with Egg Ingredients: - Rice - Egg - Olive oil - Salt - Soy sauce - Garlic - Onion - Green onion
Steps: #1 Heat a pan over medium heat and add olive oil. #2 Add garlic and onion and sauté until softened. #3 Add the egg and scramble until cooked. #4 Add the cooked rice to the pan and mix with the egg. #5 Add salt, soy sauce, and green onion and mix together. #6 Cook for a few minutes until everything is warm and mixed together. #7 Serve and enjoy!
Grilled Cheese Sandwich Ingredients: - Bread - Butter - Cheese - Salt - Pepper
Steps: #1 Preheat a skillet over medium heat. #2 Spread butter on one side of each slice of bread. #3 Place one slice of bread, butter-side down, in the skillet. #4 Sprinkle cheese over the slice of bread. #5 Sprinkle salt and pepper over the cheese. #6 Place the other slice of bread, butter-side up, on top of the cheese. #7 Grill the sandwich until the bread is golden brown and the cheese is melted, about 3 minutes per side. #8 Remove the sandwich from the skillet and serve.
Sausage and Egg Breakfast Ingredients: - Egg - Sausage - Oil - Salt - Pepper
Steps: #1 Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. #2 Add sausage and cook until browned and cooked through. #3 Remove sausage from skillet and set aside. #4 In the same skillet, add the egg and season with salt and pepper. #5 Cook egg until desired doneness. #6 Serve egg and sausage together.
Ice Cream Breakfast Ingredients: - Ice Cream - Milk - Cereal - Fruit
Steps: #1 Gather the ingredients. #2 Place the cereal and milk in a bowl. #3 Pour the ice cream over the cereal and milk. #4 Add the fruit to the bowl. #5 Mix the ingredients together! #6 Enjoy your ice cream breakfast!
